definitions.text: any factor that could be considered important to the understanding of a particular business
examples: fundamentals include a company's growth, revenues, earnings, management, and capital structure

definitions.text: the lowest tone of a harmonic series

examples: the central cause of the problem
an example that was fundamental to the argument
computers are fundamental to modern industrial structure

definitions.text: being or involving basic facts or principles
examples: the fundamental laws of the universe

definitions.text: far-reaching and thoroughgoing in effect especially on the nature of something
examples: the fundamental revolution in human values that has occurred
committed the fundamental error of confusing spending with extravagance
